NAME: Shatter Shot

Beast Mode: Scorpion

2nd transformation: Tank

3rd transformation: none

Weapons: 
1x Multi Designed Shoulder Cannon 
1x Chain Gun (Custom part for Cannon)
1x Rocket launcher (Custom part for Cannon)
1x Sniper laser (Custom part for Cannon)
1x Cluster Mortar (Custom part for Cannon) 
Equipment

Description: A large transformer designed for heavy assault Battles 
he is partner to Keyra who is mainly the brains of the team 
commanding Scatter Shot but lets him decide who to shot but makes 
suggestion that Scatter shot should target and use as a weapon

History: from day one of his creation Scatter Shot and Keyra have 
been a feared combo but was later picked to be the main assault in a 
mission to win the war before it gets to large to control even for 
the predacons







NAME: Keyra

Beast Mode: none

2nd transformation: none

3rd transformation: none

Weapons: 
2x Ionic Disruptor with custom Fusion Torpedoes with limited ammo of 
5 round per gun (Hand Held) (locked on side of right and left leg 
when not in use)
2x Diamond Edge Blades (Hand Held)
1x Diamond Air (disk like saw that asks like a boomerang)

Equipment
Vision adaptor Visor

Description: a elite human warrior for the Predicons. he may be small 
but he's light but endurable armor and small size make him a far 
smaller and faster target then any transformer is used to having to 
deal with.  His size also gives him much better close range fighting 
ability with his making quick but painful slashes with his swords

History: trained for Megatrons elite Warrior he was send back in time 
with his partner Scatter Shot he's mission was to destroy the maximal 
Leader and help win the war for the Predicons
